value:
I mentioned we were pirates, but I
originally ran a legitimate shipping
company before the war.

I used to have a brother, and let me
tell ya, he fit the role of a pirate
far better than me.

You know when you're sailing into
the sunset and for a split second the
ocean glows like gold?$k$pI live for that moment.

If you need anything for the festival,
just holler. I'll have it delivered in no
time, $Nu.

I keep my promises 'cause trust isn't
something gold can buy. That's what
I learned working the family business.

Hello. I'm Geese. Your castle's on
one of my trading routes. I've got a
parcel from $Nf.

Feels good to be able to help people
for once!
Not a bad return on investment.

Some days you get clear sailing,
others you get some chop.

You've got a good eye. I can tell you
know what you're doing!

I'm Geese. I was never a pirate by
choice, but if it's for a festival then I
guess that's all right...

My crew an' I used to run an honest
trading business. But we had to turn
to piracy to keep food on the table.$k$pThat life isn't all it's cracked up to be,
you know. It's not like the stories.$k$pSeizing innocent ships, stealing,
and killing... The role of a pirate truly
never suited me.$k$pBut if there's no bloodshed here and
we're just going to drink and sing,
then that's fine. I'll try to be merry.$k$pHopefully one day I can sail on
peaceful waters again. Yeah, that's
the dream.
でやあっ
甘いぜ！
うがあっ
やるじゃねえか…
Prepare to be boarded.
Can't outsail me.
The sea is mine.
Gotcha!
Is this as far as I go?
へっ
The name's Geese. You could call me a pirate, but I'm more a victim of circumstance.
Need something?
Might be hard to believe, but I used to captain a merchant ship. I've been everywhere the waves can take me.
My targets are typically those who can afford to lose their precious baubles.
Come again? There are people who...pretend to be pirates? I will never understand all the festivals of this world...
Saving a life is more satisfying than raking in even the biggest plunder.
You're always welcome aboard my ship. If you ever visit my world, I'll show you how beautiful the sea can be.
Will do.
What's the plan?
I'm on it.
